test-set.name: prod-CompNamespaceConstructor
test-set.description: Tests for the computed namespace constructor expression added in XQuery 3.0

schema.description: A schema defining a simple types.

test-case.name: nscons-001
test-case.description: nscons-001 - dynamic namespace constructor - variable content

test-case.name: nscons-002
test-case.description: nscons-002 - dynamic namespace constructor - variable name

test-case.name: nscons-003
test-case.description: nscons-003 - dynamic namespace constructor - default namespace

test-case.name: nscons-004
test-case.description: nscons-004 - dynamic namespace constructor - xml namespace

test-case.name: nscons-005
test-case.description: nscons-005 - dynamic namespace constructor - with dynamic element constructor

test-case.name: nscons-006
test-case.description: nscons-006 - dynamic namespace constructor - duplicates are OK

test-case.name: nscons-007
test-case.description: nscons-007 - dynamic namespace constructor - error, misuse of xmlns

test-case.name: nscons-008
test-case.description: nscons-008 - dynamic namespace constructor - error, misuse of xml

test-case.name: nscons-009
test-case.description: nscons-009 - dynamic namespace constructor - error, two bindings of same prefix

test-case.name: nscons-010
test-case.description: nscons-010 - dynamic namespace constructor - requires renaming of attribute node creates an arbitrary prefix for the attribute, so this test is designed to remove the arbitrariness

test-case.name: nscons-011
test-case.description: nscons-010 - dynamic namespace constructor - requires renaming of element node creates an arbitrary prefix for the attribute, so this test is designed to remove the arbitrariness

test-case.name: nscons-012
test-case.description: nscons-012 - dynamic namespace constructor - show some properties of the namespace node

result.assert-xml: <out><namespace same-as-self="true" is-namespace="true" namespace-uri="" is-item="true" typed-value="http://example.com/one" is-untyped="false" string-value="http://example.com/one" local-name="p" parent-exists="false" name="p" is-node="true"/><namespace same-as-self="true" is-namespace="true" namespace-uri="" is-item="true" typed-value="http://example.com/two" is-untyped="false" string-value="http://example.com/two" local-name="" parent-exists="false" name="" is-node="true"/></out>

test-case.name: nscons-013
test-case.description: nscons-013 - dynamic namespace constructor - atomization of prefix expression
test-case.test: let $pre := <prefix>z</prefix>, $uri := "http://www.zorba-xquery.com/" return <e>{ namespace { $pre } { $uri } }</e>

test-case.name: nscons-014
test-case.description: nscons-014 - dynamic namespace constructor - prefix from string
test-case.test: let $pre := "z", $uri := "http://www.zorba-xquery.com/" return <e>{ namespace { $pre } { $uri } }</e>

test-case.name: nscons-015
test-case.description: nscons-015 - dynamic namespace constructor - prefix expression is empty
test-case.test: declare namespace z="http://www.zorba-xquery.com/"; <z:e>{ namespace { <a/>/* } { "http://www.w3.org/" } }</z:e>

test-case.name: nscons-016
test-case.description: nscons-016 - dynamic namespace constructor - untypedAtomic prefix expression can not be cast to ncname
test-case.test: let $pre := <prefix>z:z</prefix>, $uri := "http://www.zorba-xquery.com/" return <e>{ namespace { $pre } { $uri } }</e>

test-case.name: nscons-017
test-case.description: nscons-017 - dynamic namespace constructor - string prefix expression can not be cast to ncname
test-case.test: let $pre := "z z", $uri := "http://www.zorba-xquery.com/" return <e>{ namespace { $pre } { $uri } }</e>

test-case.name: nscons-018
test-case.description: nscons-018 - dynamic namespace constructor - prefix expression is not string/untypedAtomic
test-case.test: let $pre := 1, $uri := "http://www.zorba-xquery.com/" return <e>{ namespace { $pre } { $uri } }</e>

test-case.name: nscons-019
test-case.description: nscons-019 - dynamic namespace constructor - bind a prefix other than xml to the namespace URI http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace
test-case.test: let $uri := "http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace" return <e>{ namespace x { $uri } }</e>

test-case.name: nscons-020
test-case.description: nscons-020 - dynamic namespace constructor - bind a prefix to the namespace URI http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/
test-case.test: let $uri := "http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/" return <e>{ namespace x { $uri } }</e>

test-case.name: nscons-021
test-case.description: nscons-021 - dynamic namespace constructor - bind any prefix to a zero-length namespace URI
test-case.test: <e>{ namespace x { "" } }</e>

test-case.name: nscons-022
test-case.description: nscons-022 - dynamic namespace constructor - added to the element's in-scope namespaces

test-case.name: nscons-023
test-case.description: nscons-023 - dynamic namespace constructor - no effect on the statically known namespaces
test-case.test: <z:e>{ namespace z { "http://www.zorba-xquery.com/" } }</z:e>

test-case.name: nscons-024
test-case.description: nscons-024 - dynamic namespace constructor - no effect on the statically known namespaces
test-case.test: <e>{ namespace z { "http://www.zorba-xquery.com/" }, element z:e {} }</e>

test-case.name: nscons-025
test-case.description: nscons-025 - dynamic namespace constructor - no effect on the statically known namespaces
test-case.test: element e { attribute z:a {}, namespace z { "http://www.zorba-xquery.com/" } }

test-case.name: nscons-026
test-case.description: nscons-026 - dynamic namespace constructor - no effect on the statically known namespaces
test-case.test: <e>{ namespace z { "http://www.zorba-xquery.com/" }, element { xs:QName("z:e") } { } }</e>

test-case.name: nscons-027
test-case.description: nscons-027 - dynamic namespace constructor - return namespace node from module

test-case.name: nscons-028
test-case.description: nscons-028 - dynamic namespace constructor - node equality and modules

test-case.name: nscons-029
test-case.description: nscons-029 - dynamic namespace constructor - serialization of namespace node
test-case.test: serialize( namespace z { "http://www.zorba-xquery.com/" } )

test-case.name: nscons-030
test-case.description: nscons-030 - dynamic namespace constructor - serialization of element with namespace node
test-case.test: serialize( element e { namespace z { "http://www.zorba-xquery.com/" } } )

test-case.name: nscons-031
test-case.description: nscons-031 - dynamic namespace constructor - copy namespaces mode

test-case.name: nscons-032
test-case.description: nscons-032 - dynamic namespace constructor - copy namespaces mode

test-case.name: nscons-033
test-case.description: nscons-033 - dynamic namespace constructor - copy namespaces mode

test-case.name: nscons-034
test-case.description: nscons-034 - dynamic namespace constructor - copy namespaces mode

test-case.name: nscons-035
test-case.description: nscons-035 - dynamic namespace constructor - copy namespaces mode and modules

test-case.name: nscons-036
test-case.description: nscons-036 - dynamic namespace constructor - copy namespaces mode and modules

test-case.name: nscons-037
test-case.description: nscons-037 - dynamic namespace constructor - copy namespaces mode and modules

test-case.name: nscons-038
test-case.description: nscons-038 - dynamic namespace constructor - copy namespaces mode and modules

test-case.name: nscons-039
test-case.description: nscons-039 - dynamic namespace constructor - recursively inherit namespaces

test-case.name: nscons-040
test-case.description: nscons-040 - dynamic namespace constructor - use during validation

test-case.name: nscons-041
test-case.description: nscons-041 - dynamic namespace constructor - use during validation

test-case.name: nscons-042
test-case.description: nscons-042 - dynamic namespace constructor - add default namespace to element in no namespace. See spec bug 22032.
test-case.test: element e { namespace {''} {'http://example.com/uri'} }

test-case.name: nscons-043
test-case.description: nscons-043 - dynamic namespace constructor - prefix expression is not string/untypedAtomic
test-case.test: let $pre := xs:anyURI('ns'), $uri := "http://www.zorba-xquery.com/" return <e>{ namespace { $pre } { $uri } }</e>

test-case.name: nscons-044
test-case.description: nscons-044 - dynamic namespace constructor - prefix expression is not string/untypedAtomic
test-case.test: let $pre := xs:duration('P1D'), $uri := "http://www.zorba-xquery.com/" return <e>{ namespace { $pre } { $uri } }</e>
